cmput301.textbookhub.Controllers

Class AppUserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.textbookhub.Controllers.BaseController
      • cmput301.textbookhub.Controllers.AppUserController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkStateObserver

    public class AppUserController
extends BaseController
implements NetworkStateObserver
    Created by Fred on 2016/3/16. Controller responsible for maintaining usr info throughout the life of the APP, uses singleton design pattern
